Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
tv
<networking> The {country code} for Tuvalu.
Heavily used for {vanity domains} by TV stations.
(1999-01-27)

TV n 1: broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects; "she is a star of screen and video"; "Television is a medium because it is neither rare nor well done" - Ernie Kovacs [syn: {television}, {telecasting}, {video}] 2: a receiver that displays television images; "the British call a tv set a telly" [syn: {television receiver}, {television}, {television set}, {tv set}, {idiot box}, {boob tube}, {telly}, {goggle box}]
